content: humber socks a hand knit sock pattern by sachiko burgin a good next pair after your basic vanilla sock the humber socks have a little bit of a stitch pattern that is easily memorized after a few rounds pattern is written for 4 ply sock yarn and double pointed needles and is available in 3 sizes tip if printing this pattern save a bit of tree and ink by not printing this page page 1 of 4 © sachiko burgin 2020 sachikoburgin@gmail com needleleafknits com pattern is for personal use copy and images cannot be reproduced or distributed without author consent humber socks finished measurements leg circumference approx 18 20 5 23 cm/ 7 8 9 ins materials 1 skein of 4 ply sock yarn/ fingering weight yarn approx 100 g/ 3½ oz and 400 m/ 437 yds 2 5 mm/ us 1½ double pointed needles or size required to achieve correct gauge 8 stitch markers and 1 removable stitch marker to mark beg of round - this is optional yarn needle gauge 36 sts and 48 row = 10 cm/ 4 ins over stockinette stitch after blocking adjust needle size to obtain correct gauge stitches 1 x 1 rib even number of sts round 1 k1 p1 repeat around repeat round 1 sk2p sl 1 k2tog pass slip_stitch over k2tog ~ 2 sts decrease d notes pattern is written for double pointed needles but can be adapted for other methods of working in the round at small circumferences stitch count will increase on round 3 of pattern as laid out in the leg section and decreased back down to original amount on round 1 for this reason please take stitch counts only after round 1 or 2 has been worked ~~ pattern make 2 ~~ cuff cast on 64 72 80 sts and divide evenly on 4 double pointed needles - 16 18 20 sts sts on each needle if desired place a removable marker into cast on to mark beg of round and move it up periodically as work progresses join for working in the round work in 1 x1 rib for 2 5 cm/1 ins knit 1 round even leg set up k3 4 5 pm k1 yo k3 yo k1 pm k16 18 20 pm k1 yo k3 yo k1 pm k3 4 5 twice knit 1 round even round 1 k3 4 5 sl m k2 sk2p k2 sl m k16 18 20 sl m k2 sk2p k2 sl m k3 4 5 twice round 2 knit 1 round even round 3 k3 4 5 sl m k1 yo k3 yo k1 sl m k16 18 20 sl m k1 yo k3 yo k1 sl m k3 4 5 twice round 4 knit 1 round even repeat rnds 1-4 until leg measures approx 12 5 cm/5 ins or desired length ending with either round 1 or round 2 page 2 of 4 © sachiko burgin 2020 sachikoburgin@gmail com needleleafknits com pattern is for personal use
